title: Inside NXIVM: How a Hollywood star lured women into a sex cult
itunes:title: Inside NXIVM: How a Hollywood star lured women into a sex cult
description:
"Smallville" actress Allison Mack is free on $5 million bond for allegedly involvement in recruiting women for a sex cult that branded them with the initials of her and the cult leader. The former publicist of NXIVM Frank Parlato shares shocking insider details of how Mack and the group operated. Grace is joined by Seattle lawyer Anne Bremner, forensics expert Joseph Scott Morgan, New York psychologist Caryn Stark, and RadarOnline reporter Alexis Tereszcuk.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
